title: Update: Four Shooting Victims Identified
content:
The four people wounded by gunfire near 84th and Q on Thursday night have been identified. Police expect all to survive their injuries.
Investigators say all four victims were in a vehicle at the Wentworth Apartments when the shooting happened around 9 p.m.
Paramedics transported Isiah McKissick, 22, to the hospital from the scene.
Three other victims made their own way to a nearby hospital - before responders arrived. Brandon Grant, Bryan Grant and Parish Tolbert all told police they were in McKissick's vehicle at the time of the shooting.
A bullet pierced the rear quarter panel on the driver's side of the vehicle. The rear windshield was partly shattered.
A witness told WOWT 6 News she heard the shots and then saw all four victims run from the vehicle.
Omaha police are actively investigating this shooting, but say they have no solid suspect information at this time.
